meanings.sent1: My grampas always tell the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grampas on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my grampas start a race, it's a slow-motion sprint!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom in my grampas' eyes is like a treasure map to the past.
meanings.sent5: The sound of my grampas' laughter echoes through the house.

meanings.sent1: Both my grampas are excellent cooks.
meanings.sent2: We celebrate holidays with all our grampas together.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a team of grampas playing basketball - that would be a sight!
meanings.sent4: The love from my grampas is a river that never runs dry.
meanings.sent5: The bond between my grampas and me is unbreakable.
